title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Waste Generation and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Waste Generation and 

Treatment Survey) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (waste generation treatment survey) order 2021

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EC) No. 2150/2002 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 25 November 20021, as amended by Commission 
Regulation (EC) No. 574/2004 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 23 February 20042, Commission Regulation (EC) No. 783/2005 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 24 May 20053, Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/20064, Regulation (EC) No. 221/2009 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 11 March 20095 and Commission Regulation (EU) No. 849/2010 
of 27 September 20106; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20064, as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 11 March 20087, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 January 20128 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20199; 

1 OJ No. L 332, 9.12.2002, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 90, 27.3.2004, p. 15 
3 OJ No. L 131, 25.5.2005, p. 38 
4 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
5 OJ No. L 87, 31.3.2009, p. 157 
6 OJ No. L 253, 28.9.2010, p. 2 
7 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
8 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
9 OJ No. L. 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [661] 3 

“survey” means the Waste Generation and Treatment Survey that is conducted 
by the Central Statistics Office for the purpose of obtaining information specified 
in the Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation; 

“waste code”, in relation to a particular type of waste, means the waste code 
assigned to that type of waste in the list of waste set out in the Annex to 
Commission Decision 2000/532/EC of 3 May 200010, as amended by 
Commission Decision 2001/118/EC of 16 January 200111, Commission 
Decision 2001/119/EC of 22 January 200112, Council Decision 2001/573/EC of 
23 July 200113 and Commission Decision 2014/955/EU of 18 December 201414. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking classified statistical purpose section nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule, in relation to the year 2020, is hereby 
prescribed. 

10 OJ No. L 226, 6.9.2000, p. 3 
11 OJ No. L 47, 16.2.2001, p. 1 
12 OJ No. L 47, 16.2.2001, p. 32 
13 OJ No. L 203, 28.7.2001, p.18 
14 OJ No. L 370, 30.12.2014, p. 44 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [661]

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Article 4

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to each type of waste
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to each type of waste 

generated by the undertaking concerned: 

(a) waste code of the waste; 

(b) description of the waste; 

(c) 

quantity of the waste; 

(d) 

location where the waste was treated; 

(e) where the waste was treated in the State on premises of the 

undertaking concerned – 

(i) 

(ii) 

the method of treatment of the waste where the method 
involved recycling, or 

the method of treatment of the waste where the method did 
not involve recycling.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates type waste generated undertaking concerned (a) waste code waste (b) description waste (c) quantity waste (d) location waste treated (e) waste treated state premise undertaking concerned - (i) (ii) method treatment waste method involved recycling method treatment waste method involve recycling

heading: 2. The eircode of the registered office, principal office or place of business
text_raw:
2. The eircode of the registered office, principal office or place of business 

of the undertaking concerned.
text_norm: 2 eircode registered office principal office place business undertaking concerned

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking to complete the
text_raw:
3. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking to complete the 
questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraphs 1 and 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 November, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
